device-detection.help: Enable/disable dynamic detection of LLDP neighbor devices for VLAN assignment.
device-detection.name: device-detection

options.help: Disable dynamic detection of LLDP neighbor devices.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable dynamic detection of LLDP neighbor devices.
options.name: enable

fast-start-interval.help: Frequency of LLDP PDU transmission from FortiSwitch for the first 4 packets when the link is up (2 - 5 sec, default = 2, 0 = disable fast start).
fast-start-interval.name: fast-start-interval

management-interface.help: Primary management interface to be advertised in LLDP and CDP PDUs.
management-interface.name: management-interface

tx-hold.help: Number of tx-intervals before local LLDP data expires (1 - 16, default = 4). Packet TTL is tx-hold * tx-interval.
tx-hold.name: tx-hold

tx-interval.help: Frequency of LLDP PDU transmission from FortiSwitch (5 - 4095 sec, default = 30). Packet TTL is tx-hold * tx-interval.
tx-interval.name: tx-interval
